title: Momentum - increasing momentum from position time

content.description: Four objects, <math alttext="P" overflow="scroll"> <mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi> </math>, <math alttext="Q" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">Q</mi></math>, <math alttext="R" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi></math> and <math alttext="S" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi></math>, can move along a straight horizontal track. The graphs in the figure show the position <math alttext="d" overflow="scroll"><mi>d</mi></math> of each of the objects plotted as a function of time <math alttext="t" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi></math>.
content.question: Which of the following objects has an increasing momentum?

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
